Name: Kiwi Batida
Ingredients: 30 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Cut kiwi in half and scoop flesh into blender. Add other ingredients and BLEND with 18oz scoop crushed ice until smooth. Serve with straws.
Review: The kiwi fruit flavour is a little lacking so this drink is improved by using kiwi-flavoured sugar syrup.
